Topic.Title: the POS dell is almost worth same as HP

Message.Msg: forget msft, ubuntu is the future os of mobile device. they already have thousands of free apps for desktop and it would kick #$%$ if dell can get the opensource platform in their devices. They currently sell servers for private cloud with ubuntu for business. if they cut microsoft out, that's a huge saving to make a tablet. and ubuntu is meant to run on any device so it cuts the hardware cost. if they can get 10 in. tablets for 299, people would buy it. msft with win 8 is the real problem and their price went down due to less demand of win 8.
